long_description: The Shimano Ultegra RD-6800-GS 11-Speed Rear Derailleur balances fast, precise shifting performance with through-the-many-miles longevity, and a cog capacity up to 32T. Using more metal than its top-shelf Dura-Ace kin, the Shimano Ultegra RD-6800-GS 11-Speed Rear Derailleur enjoys enhanced durability for lasting performance. Wide pivot design increases rigidity to resist unwanted movement or twisting when shifting, improving shifting precision and speed. Compatible with up to a 32T rear cassette sprocket, letting you use a cassette with a wide gear range for easy-spinning comfort, even on steep hills.
short_description: The Shimano Ultegra RD-6800-GS 11-Speed Rear Derailleur balances fast, precise shifting performance with through-the-many-miles longevity, and a cog capacity up to 32T.
